markdown:
**Source** [Night of the Gray Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=99) pg. 65 **Archetype** [Gray Gardener](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=124) **Prerequisites** [Vigilante Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2083); member of the Gray Gardeners --- You have a sense for when people are lying. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on your secret Perception checks to [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=85).
If you use [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=85) on a creature you have currently condemned with [Harsh Judgment](/Feats.aspx?ID=3330), your GM rolls the Perception check twice and takes the higher result (this is a fortune effect).
